recipesJson.name: Whipped Up Strawberries
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: well I was sitting around watching vaping videos on youtube and one of the flavors that was talked bout was strawberries and whipped cream & I was like oh shit those two would pair up awesome so I figured I would put this one there for ya guys and this is what I thought of so mix this and tell me whatcha think ladies and gents
